sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"旅行"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: journey, tour, travel, trip, voyage, excursion, expedition, cruise
means: journey ： 最普通用词，侧重指时间较长、距离较远的单程陆上旅行，也指水上或空中的旅行。
tour ： 指最后反回出发地，旅途中有停留游览点，距离可长可短，目的各异的周游或巡行。
travel ： 泛指旅行的行为而不指某次具体的旅行，多指到远方作长期旅行，不强调直接目的地，单、复数均可用。
trip ： 普通用词，口语多用，常指为公务或游玩作的较短暂的旅行。
voyage ： 指在水上旅行，尤指海上旅行，也可指空中旅行。
excursion ： 较正式用词，常指不超过一天的短时期娱乐性游玩，也可指乘火车或轮船往返特定景点的远足旅游。
expedition ： 指有特定目的远征或探险。
cruise ： 主要指乘船的游览并在多处停靠。

word_mean: 在斜井或斜巷内用钢丝绳牵引的由两个以上矿车组成的车组。

abbreviation.mean_cn: 三倍数，三个一组，三倍的，三倍与，增至三倍

means.word_mean: 旅行, 旅游, 有目的的外出

sentences.en: I'll make a bus trip to the town next week.
sentences.cn: 下星期我将乘公共汽车进城。

sentences.en: He often makes a round trip to the hospital alone.
sentences.cn: 他经常一个人往返医院。

means.word_mean: 轻快地行走[奔跑, 跳舞]

sentences.en: The child tripped lightly like a bird.
sentences.cn: 那个孩子像鸟儿一样轻快地奔跑着。

sentences.en: She is tripping along with her little steps.
sentences.cn: 她踏着小步在轻盈地跳着舞。

means.word_mean: 绊；绊倒(与 on， over 连用)

sentences.en: The old man tripped over a stone.
sentences.cn: 老人被石头绊了一下。

means.word_mean: 犯错误；失误(与 on， over 连用)

sentences.en: The student tripped on that difficult question.
sentences.cn: 学生答错了那道难题。

means.word_mean: 说话结结巴巴，支支吾吾

sentences.en: He trips when he gets drunk.
sentences.cn: 他一喝醉说话就结巴。

sentences.en: George trips frequently to London.
sentences.cn: 乔治常去伦敦。

means.word_mean: (勾脚)绊倒；把…绊倒(与 up 连用)

sentences.en: The child tripped him up by the heels.
sentences.cn: 小孩用脚后跟将他绊倒。

sentences.en: He stuck his foot out and tripped me.
sentences.cn: 他伸出脚把我绊倒。

sentences.en: He tripped when trying to spell this word.
sentences.cn: 他在拼写这个词时拼错了。

sentences.en: The clever lawyer tripped the witness.
sentences.cn: 那个聪明的律师使证人说错了话。

means.word_mean: 使失败；使受挫折；使停顿(与 up 连用)

sentences.en: The boxer tripped his opponent up.
sentences.cn: 拳击手将对手击倒。

means.word_mean: 抓住(某人的)谎言、过错等；揭露；暴露(与 up 连用)

sentences.en: His wrong doing will inevitably trips itself up.
sentences.cn: 他干的坏事必然会暴露。 </seg>

lj.lj_ly: tripped up on the last question.
lj.lj_ls: 在最后一个问题上犯了错误

entry.def: A trip is a journey that you make to a particular place.

example.ex: On the Thursday we went out on a day trip...
example.tran: 星期四我们出去玩了一天。

example.ex: Mark was sent to the Far East on a business trip.

entry.def: If you trip when you are walking, you knock your foot against something and fall or nearly fall.

example.ex: She tripped and fell last night and broke her hip...
example.tran: 她昨晚绊倒了，摔坏了髋骨。

example.ex: He tried to follow Jack's footsteps in the snow and tripped on a rock...
example.tran: 他想要跟着杰克在雪中留下的脚印走，却让一块石头绊倒了。

entry.def: If you trip someone who is walking or running, you put your foot or something else in front of them, so that they knock their own foot against it and fall or nearly fall.
entry.tran: 使绊;将…绊倒; 使跌倒

example.ex: One guy stuck his foot out and tried to trip me.
example.tran: 一个家伙把脚伸出来想要绊倒我。

entry.def: If you say that someone is, for example, on a power trip, a guilt trip, or a nostalgia trip, you mean that their behaviour is motivated by power, guilt, or nostalgia.
entry.tran: (对权力等的)迷恋;(内疚、怀旧感等的)困扰

example.ex: There's such pressure to be happy in Hawaii, if you're unhappy you're on a guilt trip...
example.tran: 就好像去夏威夷就一定要开心似的，如果你不开心，你会一个劲儿地感到愧疚。

example.ex: The biggest star perk, and the biggest power trip, must be the private plane.
example.tran: 顶级的明星待遇和无上的权力体验肯定要数私人飞机了。

entry.def: A trip is an experience that someone has when their mind is affected by a drug such as LSD.

example.ex: An anxious or depressed person can experience a really bad trip.
example.tran: 焦虑或抑郁的人吸毒后可能会有非常糟糕的幻觉。

entry.def: If someone is tripping, they are having an experience in which their mind is affected by a drug such as LSD.

example.ex: One night I was tripping on acid.
example.tran: 有一天晚上我服用了迷幻药后正在幻游。

entry.def: If someone trips somewhere, they walk there with light, quick steps.

example.ex: A girl in a red smock tripped down the hill...
example.tran: 一个身穿红色罩衫的女孩迈着轻快的步子下山。

example.ex: They tripped along with scarcely a care in the world.
example.tran: 他们轻快地走着，几乎没有世间的烦恼。

means.word_mean: 1. a journey for some purpose (usually including the return);

sentences.sentence: "he took a trip to the shopping center"

means.word_mean: 2. a hallucinatory experience induced by drugs;
3. an accidental misstep threatening (or causing) a fall;

sentences.sentence: "he blamed his slip on the ice"
"the jolt caused many slips and a few spills"

means.word_mean: 5. a catch mechanism that acts as a switch;

sentences.sentence: "the pressure activates the tripper and releases the water"
"he heard the trip of women's feet overhead"
"he recited the whole poem without a single trip"
"he arranged his robes to avoid a trip-up later"

means.word_mean: 1. miss a step and fall or nearly fall;

sentences.sentence: "The questions on the test tripped him up"

means.word_mean: 4. put in motion or move to act;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French triper, from Middle Dutch trippen 'to skip, hop'

means: transformation-induced plasticity 高强度及高延性

sentences.cn: 我们到山里去旅游了。
sentences.en: We went on a trip to the mountains.

sentences.cn: 与此类似,pfizer公司同其他药品公司一样, 通过组织旅游和其他活动来吸引药品批发商.
sentences.en: Pfizer, like other drug firms, attracts drug wholesalers by sponsoring trips and other events.

sentences.cn: 她让我在去纽约旅游时给她带些东西.
sentences.en: She asked me to bring a few things back from my trip to New York.

sentences.cn: 我宁愿花钱买台电脑而不去旅游的.
sentences.en: I would prefer buy computer rather than go on a trip.

sentences.cn: 如果是随旅行团旅游, 可由当地组团旅游机关提交签证申请.
sentences.en: When traveling group, the visa application can be submitted by the local agent organizing the trip.

sentences.cn: 附后是一些这次旅游的照片.
sentences.en: Attachments are some of the trip photos.

sentences.cn: 一个记者正在采访一个旅游归来的医生.
sentences.en: A journalist is interviewing a doctor after a trip.

sentences.cn: 我们旅游时的天气好极了.
sentences.en: We had a grand weather for our trip.

sentences.cn: 有时候,人们举行简单的结婚仪式,这样他们就能够进行一次高消费的结婚旅游.
sentences.en: Sometimes people have simple marriage ceremonies so they can take a costly wedding trip.

sentences.cn: 我有一次接到一个很紧急的任务,而我本来与家里人计划好了去旅游的.
sentences.en: Once I got an urgent task when I had planned a tour trip with my family.

sentences.cn: 大家要我组织这次旅游, 可是我把事情搞糟了.
sentences.en: I am ask to organize the trip, but I mess it up.

sentences.cn: 这两位老人骑自行车旅游全国是很不平常的事.
sentences.en: The two old men's trip through all the country by bicycle was one for the books.

sentences.cn: 中: 你们团里有了这么些人, 那次旅游最后怎么样了 呢 ?
sentences.en: Chinese: Well, how did the trip turn out in the end, with such people in your group?

sentences.cn: 何不去有名的城市旅游 呢 ?
sentences.en: Why not take a pleasure trip to some famous city?

sentences.cn: 这种现象, 有时叫做旅游癖, 可以用来解释为什么人们会把那么多时间和金钱花在有趣的旅游场所.
sentences.en: This phenomenon, sometimes called wanderlust, may explain why people spend so much time and money on trips to interesting places.

sentences.cn: 朋友, 无论您是公务出差 、 度假旅游还是会议培训, 这里都是您理想的选择.
sentences.en: Friends, whether you are business trip, holiday or training session, here is your ideal choice.

sentences.cn: 在假期里他到最近的海滨旅游胜地做了一次旅行.
sentences.en: He wenton a trip to the nearest seaside resort during his vacation.

sentences.cn: 我能在旅馆里预订旅游行程 吗 ?
sentences.en: Can I book trips here at the hotel?

sentences.cn: 于是梅森先生决定横渡大西洋来旅游.
sentences.en: Mason decided to cross the Atlantic Ocean as a trip.

sentences.cn: 我们规定了这次旅游的费用.
sentences.en: We set a limit to the expense of the trip.

sentences.cn: 我将略述我旅游海外的计画.
sentences.en: I will outline my plans for my trip abroad.

sentences.cn: 这个公司已经为有Bahamas潜水的游客提供旅游客船好几年了.
sentences.en: The company has provided passenger boat trips for divers in the Bahamas for several years.

sentences.cn: 不但提供免费样品, 而且提供免费汽车, 免费住房乃至免费出国旅游.
sentences.en: They not only offer samples, but free cars, free houses, and free trip abroad as well.

sentences.cn: 在夏天, 我也和我的父母一起旅游.
sentences.en: In summer, I always go on a trip with my parents.

sentences.cn: 你期望去旅游 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are you looking forward to your trip?

sentences.cn: 我一提起到国外旅游的打算, 孩子们顿时显得兴致勃勃.
sentences.en: When I mentioned our plans for a trip abroad, the kids came to life at once.

sentences.cn: 享受旅游欧洲之乐的时间,是在回来打开行李三星期之后.
sentences.en: The time to enjoy a European trip is about three weeks after unpacking.

sentences.cn: 我有个去海外旅游的机会.
sentences.en: I have an opportunity to go an oversea trip.

sentences.cn: 这次旅游让我们对地方风情开了眼.
sentences.en: The trip opened our eyes to local customs.

sentences.cn: 有钱的话还可以到一个小镇去旅游.
sentences.en: Money to pay in money for a trip to town.

sentences.cn: 迷幻药产生的幻觉
sentences.en: an acid (= LSD) trip

sentences.cn: 焦虑或抑郁的人吸毒后可能会有非常糟糕的幻觉。
sentences.en: An anxious or depressed person can experience a really bad trip.

sentences.cn: 在 维加斯 看太阳马戏团的节目还抽着幻觉蘑菇.
sentences.en: PLAYBOY : Seeing a Cirque du Soleil show in Vegas while tripping on hallucinogenic mushrooms [ Knocked Up ] .

sentences.cn: 严重的幻觉可能使一个人永远失去自制力.
sentences.en: A " bad " trip can destroy a person's stability.

sentences.cn: 有人在药物试验中产生了幻觉.
sentences.en: Some people experienced a trip while experimenting with drugs.

sentences.cn: 你有过服迷幻药后的幻觉体验 吗 ?
sentences.en: Have you ever tripped out?

sentences.cn: 因此, 力量幻觉可减轻所缺乏的安全感, 于是他们就沉迷于这种感受.
sentences.en: Thus, the power trip alleviates their insecurity, and they revel in this feeling.

sentences.cn: 焦虑或抑郁的人吸毒后可能会有非常糟糕的幻觉。
sentences.en: An anxious or depressed person can experience a really bad trip.

sentences.cn: 有人会让那条电缆绊倒的。
sentences.en: Someone will trip over that cable.

sentences.cn: 你小心别在台阶上绊倒了。
sentences.en: Be careful you don't trip up on the step.

sentences.cn: 我经过时，他伸出腿来想把我绊倒。
sentences.en: As I passed, he stuck out a leg and tried to trip me up.

sentences.cn: 她昨晚绊倒了，摔坏了髋骨。
sentences.en: She tripped and fell last night and broke her hip...

sentences.cn: 他想要跟着杰克在雪中留下的脚印走，却让一块石头绊倒了。
sentences.en: He tried to follow Jack's footsteps in the snow and tripped on a rock...

sentences.cn: 一个家伙把脚伸出来想要绊倒我。
sentences.en: One guy stuck his foot out and tried to trip me.

sentences.cn: 他在向后走的时候被绊倒了.
sentences.en: Tripped when he stepped backward.

sentences.cn: 今天, 当你不管是因公因私走进一个学校时,你很可能会被满坑满谷的家长绊倒.
sentences.en: Now you can walk into schools , public or private, without tripping over parents in the halls.

sentences.cn: 那个摔跤运动员把对手绊倒在地.
sentences.en: The wrestler tripped up his opponent.

sentences.cn: 他顽皮地伸出一只脚,几乎把他的姐姐绊倒在地.
sentences.en: He playfully put his foot out and tripped his sister up.

sentences.cn: 我在人行道上绊倒了,扭伤了脚踝.
sentences.en: I tripped over on the pavement and twisted my ankle.

sentences.cn: 他被一块砖头绊倒了.
sentences.en: He tripped over a brick.

sentences.cn: 这块松弛的木板把他绊倒.
sentences.en: The loose board tripped him.

sentences.cn: 有人伸出一条腿,把我绊倒了.
sentences.en: Someone stuck a leg out and tripped me up.

sentences.cn: 我被绳子绊倒.
sentences.en: I tripped against a rope.

sentences.cn: 当心别被那些树根绊倒, 它们埋在这些树叶底下不容易发现.
sentences.en: Mind you, don't trip over these roots; they're difficult to see under all these leaves.

sentences.cn: 她被电线绊倒.
sentences.en: She tripped over the wire.

sentences.cn: 兴奋当中, 本向后一跃绊倒在一堆木头上.
sentences.en: In his excitement, Ben jumped backwards and tripped over a lump of wood.

sentences.cn: 他总是笨手笨脚, 每次经过那张书桌他总是会被绊倒.
sentences.en: He's so clumsy, he always trips and falls when he passes that desk.

sentences.cn: 人不是被大山绊倒, 而是被鼠丘绊倒.
sentences.en: Men trip not on mountains! They trip on molehills.

sentences.cn: 如果你不当心,你会被石头绊倒的.
sentences.en: You'll trip over the stone if you don't mind out.

sentences.cn: 我被一个篮子绊倒了.
sentences.en: I tripped over a basket.

sentences.cn: 他在台阶上绊倒了.
sentences.en: He tripped over the step.

sentences.cn: 她并不是无意中把罗斯绊倒的, 她这样做是有预谋的.
sentences.en: She did not trip Rose up accidentally, it was done with malice aforethought.

sentences.cn: 他被树根绊倒.
sentences.en: He tripped over the root of a tree.

sentences.cn: 有人被电线绊倒.
sentences.en: Somebody tripped over the cord.

sentences.cn: 我被他绊倒.
sentences.en: I was tripped by him.

sentences.cn: 我绊倒了,重重地在地板上.
sentences.en: I tripped and fell bang on the floor.

sentences.cn: 他们轻快地走着，几乎没有世间的烦恼。
sentences.en: They tripped along with scarcely a care in the world.

sentences.cn: 领舞者轻快地走到前台深深地鞠了个躬.
sentences.en: The principal dancer tripped forward to the front of the stage and made a deep curtsey.

sentences.cn: 她轻快地走着, 湛蓝的天空好像在她心里灌注了蓝色的液体.
sentences.en: She tripped along, the clear sky pouring liquid blue into her soul.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 他们轻快地走着，几乎没有世间的烦恼。
sentences.en: They tripped along with scarcely a care in the world.

Sentence.sentence: The second trip was made in October last year.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Scientists identified 20 of the one-meter-long snakes during two trips to the Caribbean islands.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: However, he'll need to do so without tripping the anti-jamming system, the details of which he almost certainly does not have access to.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Yesterday I made reservations for my trip to Miami next month.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Do you think you could pop through and bring me up to date on the arrangements for the Italian trip
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Inform him of the arrangements for his trip in Italy.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Making preparations for a trans-Atlantic trip.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: My biology teacher did not even let me explain why I missed the field trip.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The woman should have gone on the field trip
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: And here's one more: We went on a campaign trip once in Italy, and my wife spent the whole time worrying about bats getting into her hair.
Sentence.come: 2017年6月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: And my university classmates are arranging a trip to vi sit our old campus, and I'd love to go with them, but I can't afford both.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: Taking a trip underwater and exploring the inside of a sunken A0 would be quite an adventure, and that is exactly what Turkish authorities are hoping this attraction will make people think.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A

Sentence.sentence: Taking a trip underwater and exploring the inside of a sunken A300 would be quite an adventure, and that is exactly what Turkish authorities are hoping this attraction will make people think.
Sentence.come: 2019年6月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section A
